medical_history.chief_complaint: Anaphylaxis in an 8-year-old male after playing in tall grass.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began to experience symptoms 15 minutes after entering an area of overgrowth next to a river, where he was playing with friends. Symptoms included sensation of something stuck in his throat, appearance of itchy urticaria on his body, and slight dyspnea with stridor.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a history of atopic dermatitis and nasal allergy. He had taken anti-allergic medications for Japanese cedar pollen from February to April for the last two years.
medical_history.family_history: Both the patient and his mother have a history of atopic dermatitis and nasal allergy.
medical_history.social_history: He had played in the same area during the previous two years.
